about_the_game:
You are a Squid trying to escape the 5 layers of the underworld, but the only way you can move is blasting yourself around with explosions. You'll have to build up momentum to clear jumps and avoid falling back down.

Don't worry it wont take you too long to get back to where you fell, unless you fall again.

Gameplay:

This is a rocket jumping game where you progress through increasingly more difficult jumps, and very often fall back down.

All you have to do is: Aim and Shoot at the floor

  • Build up momentum with your ink blasts

  • Fly across large gaps

  • Bonk your head against a wall

  • Fall all the way back down

  • Shoot two bubbles together and launch yourself into it for a massive boost in the air

  • Every success and failure is auto saved

As you ascend through the underworld you will endure many hardships:

  • Massive boulders from the sky

  • Harsh winds

  • Disappearing blocks

  • Slippery Ice

  • And much more!

Local Co-op:

If you don't want to fall all by yourself you can play with up to 8 players!

  • Each player will attempt to scale the underworld one at a time

  • 3 bonks and it saves your last position and moves to the next player

Atmosphere:

You'll get enraged at some point, but that cute squid smile and fast speed with bring you right back to loving it!

  • 5 layers each with unique environments

  • A soundtrack containing songs for each layer

  • New collectable colors and hats for your Squid to wear!

  • Cute NPCs you can chat with as you climb

  • Everything hand drawn with a trackpad

"Yes, my fellow Squinks will tremble as they watch me splatter and soar!"

 -Squink

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

name: Squink

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Gather your friends and to play as Squids trying to escape the underworld. One wrong jump can send you to the bottom.
